.@realDonaldTrump just finished.  Almost everything he said was inaccurate.  The Wall doesn’t stop drugs.  Dems didn’t request a steel wall.  There is a crisis at the border, but it is a humanitarian crisis he has created.  And Ds fully support border security.

@realDonaldTrump is saying Dems oppose border security.  He just can’t tell the truth.  Ds and Rs all support border security, smart border security, but not a wasteful 4th century plan for a 21st century challenge.

The REAL crisis is America’s mistreatment of Felipe and other children – not @realDonaldTrump’s desperation to build his wall for his own political reasons. This shutdown is political theater and it’s wrong.

We cannot allow another child to suffer Felipe’s fate. Children need and deserve necessary medical care. Period. CBP has now belatedly hired someone to revamp their systems. Congress must ensure this happens.
Inflicting trauma on children as a political strategy comes from a very dark place in the heart of the @realDonaldTrump administration, and it must end.

Second, these tragedies flow in part from the Trump war on immigrant children: Child separation; a vastly expanded string of child prisons; family internment camps; and an overall strategy of inflicting trauma on children as central to a political “deterrence” strategy.

One clear point is this: A medical professional should be on hand to give every immigrant child a basic medical check. If a child has a fever, or is dehydrated, or listless, let’s get them to a hospital.
Felipe’s death is tragic, as is the death of 7-year-old Jakelin earlier in December. No child should ever die in American custody from insufficient medical care.
